字母: (じぼ) - letter (of an alphabet)/syllabic character; matrix/printing type
字画: (じかく) - number of strokes in character
字種: (じしゅ) - character class; set of related or similar characters
字義: (じぎ) - the meaning or sense of a word
字訓: (じくん) - the Japanese reading of a kanji
字詰め: (じづめ) - number of characters; manuscript paper; printed matter
字足らず: (じたらず) - waka, haiku, etc. with insufficient syllables
字配り: (じくばり) - word or letter layout
字間: (じかん) - space between letters or characters; inter-character space
字面: (じづら) - impression derived from or appearance of kanji; face; appearance of written words
字音: (じおん) - Japanese pronunciation of a kanji (based on adopted Chinese pronunciations)
字類条件: (じるいじょうけん) - class condition
存える: (ながらえる) - to have a long life; to live a long time
存じる: (ぞんじる) - to think, feel, consider, know, etc.
存じ上げる: (ぞんじあげる) - to know; to think
存ずる: (ぞんずる) - to think, feel, consider, know, etc.
存亡: (そんぼう) - life or death; existence; destiny
存分: (ぞんぶん) - to one's heart's content; as much as one wants
存分に: (ぞんぶんに) - freely; to one's heart's content
存否: (そんぴ) - (whether) existent or non-existent; life or death
存命中: (ぞんめいちゅう) - in one's lifetime; (while) in life
存在価値: (そんざいかち) - value to society; raison d'être; existence value
存在意義: (そんざいいぎ) - (yoji) meaning of life; meaning of one's existence
存在理由: (そんざいりゆう) - (yoji) reason for being; raison d'être
存在論的証明: (そんざいろんてきしょうめい) - ontological argument
存在量: (そんざいりょう) - abundance; stock/amount/existing amount
存外: (ぞんがい) - beyond or contrary to expectations
存廃: (ぞんぱい) - (whether to) continue or eliminate; existence
存廃問題: (そんぱいもんだい) - (yoji) question of maintenance or abolition (of an institution, organization, etc.)
孜々営々: (ししえいえい) - (yoji) assiduously; with unremitting zeal
孜孜営営: (ししえいえい) - (yoji) assiduously; with unremitting zeal
孝弟: (こうてい) - filial piety; brotherly love
孝悌: (こうてい) - filial piety; brotherly love
孝経: (こうきょう) - the Book of Filial Piety
孝行をしたい時分に親は無し: (こうこうをしたいじぶんにおやはなし) - (proverb) When you wish to be filial, your parents are gone
孝養: (こうよう) - filial duties; devotion to one's parents
孟冬: (もうとう) - beginning of winter; tenth month of the lunar calendar
孟夏: (もうか) - beginning of summer; fourth month of the lunar calendar
孟子: (もうし) - Mencius (Meng Zi) (371-289BCE); the Discourses of Mencius - one of the Four Books
孟宗の節: (もうそうのふし) - root of a moso bamboo
孟宗竹: (モウソウダケ) - moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens); tall bamboo cultivated for its edible shoots
孟春: (もうしゅん) - beginning of spring; first month of the lunar calendar
孟母三遷: (もうぼさんせん) - (yoji)  the importance of creating an environment conducive to a child's learning; Mencius' mother, three moves
孟母三遷の教え: (もうぼさんせんのおしえ) - the importance of creating an environment conducive to a child's learning; Mencius' mother, three moves
孟秋: (もうしゅう) - beginning of autumn; seventh month of the lunar calendar
季: (ki) - estações, estação; palavra ou frase sazonal (em haicai); ano
季冬: (きとう) - end of winter; twelfth month of the lunar calendar
季夏: (きか) - end of summer; sixth month of the lunar calendar
季寄せ: (きよせ) - dictionary of seasonal words (for haiku and haikai)
季春: (きしゅん) - late spring; third month of the lunar calendar
季秋: (きしゅう) - end of autumn; ninth month of the lunar calendar
季節のたより: (きせつのたより) - season's tidings; seasonal letter
季節の便り: (きせつのたより) - season's tidings; seasonal letter
季節の移り変わり: (きせつのうつりかわり) - changing seasons; season's transition; transition from one season to the next; turn of the seasons; turning of the seasons
季節はずれ: (きせつはずれ) - unseasonable; out of season
季節労働: (きせつろうどう) - seasonal labor; seasonal labour
季節労働者: (きせつろうどうしゃ) - seasonal laborer; seasonal labourer
季節回遊: (きせつかいゆう) - seasonal migration (of fish, etc.)
季節外れ: (きせつはずれ) - unseasonable; out of season
